name: Living in France
description: You have just arrived in France and you want to speak French to communicate on a daily basis? This application is made for you !   Vivre en France (Living in France) is a French language learning application developed by the Alliance franaise Paris le-de-France with the support of the Government Office for the Integration of Foreign Nationals ( Direction de laccueil, de laccompagnement des trangers et de la nationalit  or DAAEN).  It is specially designed for newcomers to France who are absolute beginners in french.   Its objective is to give learners confidence by offering them the opportunity to prepare for everyday communication and also for administrative procedures, using exercise programmes and an illustrated dictionary.  The application gives learners language tools for 20 different communication scenarios ranging from everyday situations to dealing with administrative formalities.  Interactive activities help learners build up their skills from word to sentence, from sentence to communication situation. Learners work on both writing and speaking. Included is a customizable multimedia dictionary with 500 words and sentences in context which will help users enrich their vocabulary.  This application opens the door to further french studies with the MOOC collection Vivre en France on the FUN platform, from level A1 to B1.
